website_summaries.verdict: Unique hexagon vase has a modern, sleek design.
pros: Unique, aesthetically pleasing design makes a perfect centerpiece
5.7-inch vase has a 3.5-inch opening, ideal for small desktops or bookshelves
Glass feels heavy, thick, and durable
Textured pattern catches the light beautifully
cons: Glass arrives foggy, but clears up after a good wash

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This vase is beautiful! I had to wash it when it arrived it smelled and looked kinda dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Proud Mommy

customer_reviews.title: It looked messy and nothing like the photo
customer_reviews.text: The glass was really foggy, kind of had a film to it, and the edges weren't clean. It looked messy and nothing like the photo
customer_reviews.author: hmarie

customer_reviews.title: Thick glass vase
customer_reviews.text: This vase does what i needed it to do - hold water and look pretty. The glass is very thick, which takes away from the elegance a bit. But nice vase overall!
customer_reviews.author: MroTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great little vase
customer_reviews.text: Great looking vase, glass is clear with good optic quality.
customer_reviews.author: Anna K. Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful low case.
customer_reviews.text: Low enough to keep on a dining table and still holds a lot of flowers.
customer_reviews.author: Neelima

customer_reviews.title: Arrived all dirty
customer_reviews.text: Arrived all dirty. Had to wash it as it was filthy
customer_reviews.author: roge

customer_reviews.title: Not worth $15
customer_reviews.text: The picture looks way better than what I got. Not worth $15.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my home office
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and without any damage. Great addition to my home office!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Robnett

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful vase
customer_reviews.text: This is a very beautiful vase just what I have been looking for. It holdmy roses perfectly because it's round and small. Thanks so much!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Lopyrev

customer_reviews.title: Great vase
customer_reviews.text: Really nice sturdy strong glass vase. Very pretty when flowers are added
customer_reviews.author: Johnny B

customer_reviews.title: Great for short/fat bouquets!
customer_reviews.text: Had been searching for a somewhat unique vase for bouquets. This fits the bill. Not too crazy looking, but certainly not your grandmother's face, this works best for short/fat bouquets. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Wasn’t an approved purchase so I did return it but the quality seemed good!
customer_reviews.text: Decent vase. Wasn’t an approved purchase so I did return it but the quality seemed good!
customer_reviews.author: MommaDukes

customer_reviews.title: Crap!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered and sadly it was crap. Wouldn't pick this up from goodwill for 50 cents.
customer_reviews.author: SATTER

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this item. It's very pretty on my coffee table
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: 👍
customer_reviews.text: Really good quality and super cute. I like it a lot :)
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

product_meta.title: MyGift 5-inch Clear Glass Hexagon Shape Flower Vase, Tabletop Prism Wedding Party Decor
product_meta.description:
Color:ClearFill your space with fresh bouquets or home decor with this luxurious hexagon design clear glass vase. This vase faceted shape is ideal for catching the eye of family and guests, and which perfectly highlights any items stored in the interior. Its petite sizes makes it a convenient addition to almost any tabletop space, including on bathroom countertops and living room coffee tables. Whether it's for a wedding event or for daily decorative purposes, this vase will perform admirably as a gorgeous decorative centerpiece.

**Official MyGift product.** Flowers and plants not included.

Approximate Dimensions (in inches): Overall - 5.30 W X 5.71 H. Opening - 3.15 D.
feature_bullets: An elegantly crafted clear glass decorative vase with a hexagon shape
Small size makes this vase ideal for desktop, bookshelf, or window sill
Petite size and contemporary design make this the ideal centerpiece for guest tables or even as a lavish addition to everyday decor
**Official MyGift product.** Flowers and plants not included
Approximate Dimensions (in inches): Overall - 5.30 W X 5.71 H. Opening - 3.15 D
